summary: Implements the command infrastructure for running Ansible integration test suites across POSIX, Windows, and network targets. It manages test environment configuration, inventory creation, target filtering, dependency mapping, optional code‑coverage collection, and result handling.
business_intent: Enable automated, cross‑platform execution of Ansible integration tests within development and CI pipelines, providing reliable environment provisioning, configurable targeting, and reporting capabilities to validate Ansible modules and playbooks.
